promotions.playstationSub: Not just control, but high performance

contact.subtitle: Speed in Response
contact.description: High speed in response faster than a rocket. You can rely on our fast and technical support to solve problems you face. The Haws technical team enjoys high experience in communication and technology, so we choose our employees with great care and accuracy to meet your needs.

hero.title: Gaming Keyboard RGB Professional Colors
hero.subtitle: High performance and ergonomic design for gaming
hero.description: Enjoy an unparalleled gaming experience with our new mechanical keyboard, featuring high response speed and stunning RGB lighting.
hero.paymentDesc: Cash on delivery or via credit card

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: High speed and security in delivering orders, all you have to do is buy and we will follow your order carefully.

orderTracking.title: High Tracking for Your Orders
orderTracking.description: We provide you with an easy graphical interface to follow up on orders, you can follow the progress of your order with ease.

securePayment.title: Secure and Convenient Payment
securePayment.description: We provide security for your bank data as we do not store any sensitive data, and we encrypt and protect it from intruders.
